tool_description: Fetch any Indian Vehicle’s Information in detail through it’s Registration Number/License Plate. This API has the capability to retrieve the below information,  Owner Name, Owner’s Phone, Owner’s Address, Vehicle Details, Financer Details, RC details, RTO based registration number, Insurance Details, Chassis Number, Registration Number, Fuel Description, Vehicle Fitness, PUC Info, Owner’s PAN, Owner’s DL Number And much more.
name: RTO Vehicle Information Verification India
title: RTO Vehicle Information Verification India

api_list.name: vehicleInfo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rto-vehicle-information-verification-india.p.rapidapi.com/api/rc/vehicleinfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rto-vehicle-information-verification-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rto-vehicle-information-verification-india.p.rapidapi.com/api/rc/vehicleinfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rto-vehicle-information-verification-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
